mapper.select: SELECT KIGYO_CD AS kigyoCd, SHINSEI_NO AS shinseiNo, SHINSEI_KBN AS shinseiKbn, SHINCHOKU_KBN AS shinchokuKbn FROM SHINSEI WHERE SHINSEI_NO = #{shinseiNo}
SELECT KIGYO_CD AS kigyoCd, SHINSEI_NO AS shinseiNo, KEIRO_SEQ AS shinsesiSeq, TSUKIN_SHUDAN_KBN AS tsukinShudan FROM SHINSEI_START_KEIRO WHERE SHINSEI_NO = #{shinseiNo}
